title: Beneficient reprobate: ethyl alcohol, its nature and properties
creator_credit: Burton Holmes Films and Elmer Clifton
brief_description: Sponsored by the Women’s Christian Temperance Union, this film deals with the industrial uses of alcohol, and the effects of alcohol on the central nervous system of the human body. Produced from Bertha Rachel Palmer’s “A Syllabus in Alcohol Education”.
